Variables
SharpNeat.​Windows
namespace SharpNeat.Windows
ViewportControl
UserControl
public
ViewportControl

A user control that provides an area on which content can be drawn (by a IViewportPainter.  Otherwise the control is a simple one, providing no user interaction capability other than resizing.

const PixelFormat __viewportPixelFormat
